            Development Project : Credit 0261 - Credit Agreement - Conformed

abstracts.cdata!:
The Third Livestock Development Project
            will help finance credit programs for beef cattle and sheep
            ranchers, technical services related thereto, a study of
            meat processing and marketing, and construction and
            renovation of slaughterhouses and cold storage facilities.
